original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ mettam vacī kammam paccupaṭṭhitam hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ca iva raho ca ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mettaṁ manokammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ mettam manaḥ kammam paccupaṭṭhitam hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvi ca iva rahaḥ ca ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhammaladdhā antamaso pattapariyāpannamattampi
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhamma laddhā antamasaḥ patta pariyāpanna mattam pi

original: tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhattabhogī hoti sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇabhogī,
analyzed: tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhatta bhogī hoti sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇa bhogī

original: ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo.
analyzed: ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni a sabalāni

original: akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṁvattanikāni tathārūpehi
analyzed: a kammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni a parāmaṭṭhāni samādhi savattanikāni tathārūpehi

original: sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo.
analyzed: sīlehi sīla sāmañña gataḥ viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ca iva raho ca ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyo

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu yā ayam diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa

original: sammā dukkhakkhayāya tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi
analyzed: sammā dukkha kkhayāya tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhi sāmañña gataḥ viharati sabrahmacārīhi

original: āvi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo.
analyzed: āvi ca iva raho ca ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyo

original: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhammā sāraṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave cha dhammā sāraṇīyā ati

original: Paṭhamaṁ.

original: 2. Sāraṇīyavagga
analyzed: sāraṇīya vagga

original: Dutiyasāraṇīyasutta

original: “Chayime, bhikkhave, dhammā sāraṇīyā piyakaraṇā garukaraṇā saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattanti.

analyzed: katame cha

analyzed: ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyaḥ piya karaṇaḥ garu karaṇaḥ saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno mettaṁ vacīkammaṁ paccupaṭṭhitaṁ hoti …pe….
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ mettam vacī kammam paccupaṭṭhitam hoti pe

analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu ye te lābhā dhammikā dhamma laddhā antamasaḥ patta pariyāpanna mattam pi

analyzed: tathārūpehi lābhehi appaṭivibhatta bhogī hoti sīlavantehi sabrahmacārīhi sādhāraṇa bhogī

analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni a sabalāni

analyzed: a kammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni a parāmaṭṭhāni samādhi savattanikāni tathārūpehi

original: sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca, ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo
analyzed: sīlehi sīla sāmañña gataḥ viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ca iva raho ca ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyo

analyzed: piya karaṇaḥ garu karaṇaḥ saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyai ekībhāvāya savattati

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yāyaṁ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu yā ayam diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa

original: sammā dukkhakkhayāya tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ceva raho ca,
analyzed: sammā dukkha kkhayāya tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhi sāmañña gataḥ viharati sabrahmacārīhi āvi ca iva raho ca

original: ayampi dhammo sāraṇīyo piyakaraṇo garukaraṇo saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya saṁvattati.
analyzed: ayam pi dhammo sāraṇīyaḥ piya karaṇaḥ garu karaṇaḥ saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya savattati

analyzed: ime kho bhikkhave cha dhammā sāraṇīyā piya karaṇā garu karaṇā saṅgahāya avivādāya sāmaggiyā ekībhāvāya savattanti iti

original: Dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: dutiya

analyzed: aṅguttara nikāya

original: 2. Sāraṇīyavagga
analyzed: sāraṇīya vagga

analyzed: nissāraṇīya sutta

original: “Chayimā, bhikkhave, nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo.
analyzed: chayimāḥ bhikkhave nissāraṇīyāḥ dhātuyaḥ

original: Katamā cha?
analyzed: katamā cha

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu evam vadeyya

original: ‘mettā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
analyzed: mettā hi kho me cetaḥ vimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yā anīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā su samāraddhā

original: atha ca pana me byāpādo cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
analyzed: atha ca pana me byāpādaḥ cittam pariyādāya tiṭṭhati iti

original: So ‘mā hevan’tissa vacanīyo: ‘māyasmā evaṁ avaca; mā bhagavantaṁ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṁ, na hi bhagavā evaṁ vadeyya.
analyzed: saḥ mā hevantissa vacanīyaḥ mā ayasmai evam avaca mā bhagavantam abbhācikkhi na hi sādhu bhagavataḥ na hi bhagavā evam vadeyya

original: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṁ mettāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
analyzed: aṭṭhānam ete āvuso anavakāsaḥ yam mettāya cetovimuttiyāḥ bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya su samāraddhāya

original: atha ca panassa byāpādo cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: atha ca panassa byāpādaḥ cittam pariyādāya na itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Nissaraṇañhetaṁ, āvuso, byāpādassa yadidaṁ mettācetovimuttī’ti.
analyzed: nissaraṇam ha itas āvuso byāpādassa yat idam mettā cetaḥ vimutti iti

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu evam vadeyya

original: ‘karuṇā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
analyzed: karuṇā hi kho me cetaḥ vimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yā anīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā su samāraddhā

original: atha ca pana me vihesā cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
analyzed: atha ca pana me vihesā cittam pariyādāya tiṭṭhati iti

original: So ‘mā hevan’tissa vacanīyo: ‘māyasmā evaṁ avaca; mā bhagavantaṁ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṁ, na hi bhagavā evaṁ vadeyya.
analyzed: saḥ mā hevantissa vacanīyaḥ mā ayasmai evam avaca mā bhagavantam abbhācikkhi na hi sādhu bhagavataḥ na hi bhagavā evam vadeyya

original: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṁ karuṇāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
analyzed: aṭṭhānam ete āvuso anavakāsaḥ yam karuṇāya cetaḥ vimuttiyāḥ bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya su samāraddhāya

original: atha ca panassa vihesā cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: atha ca panassa vihesā cittam pariyādāya na itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Nissaraṇañhetaṁ, āvuso, vihesāya yadidaṁ karuṇācetovimuttī’ti.
analyzed: nissaraṇam ha itas āvuso vihesāya yat idam karuṇā cetaḥ vimutti iti

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu evam vadeyya

original: ‘muditā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
analyzed: muditā hi kho me cetaḥ vimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yā anīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā su samāraddhā

original: atha ca pana me arati cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
analyzed: atha ca pana me arati cittam pariyādāya tiṭṭhati iti

original: So ‘mā hevan’tissa vacanīyo: ‘māyasmā evaṁ avaca; mā bhagavantaṁ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṁ, na hi bhagavā evaṁ vadeyya.
analyzed: saḥ mā hevantissa vacanīyaḥ mā ayasmai evam avaca mā bhagavantam abbhācikkhi na hi sādhu bhagavataḥ na hi bhagavā evam vadeyya

original: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṁ muditāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
analyzed: aṭṭhānam ete āvuso anavakāsaḥ yam muditāya cetovimuttiyāḥ bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya su samāraddhāya

original: atha ca panassa arati cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: atha ca panassa arati cittam pariyādāya na itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Nissaraṇañhetaṁ, āvuso, aratiyā yadidaṁ muditācetovimuttī’ti.
analyzed: nissaraṇam ha itas āvuso aratiyāḥ yat idam muditā cetaḥ vimuttī iti

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu evam vadeyya

original: ‘upekkhā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;

original: atha ca pana me rāgo cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
analyzed: atha ca pana me rāgaḥ cittam pariyādāya tiṭṭhati iti

original: So ‘mā hevan’tissa vacanīyo: ‘māyasmā evaṁ avaca; mā bhagavantaṁ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṁ, na hi bhagavā evaṁ vadeyya.
analyzed: saḥ mā hevantissa vacanīyaḥ mā ayasmai evam avaca mā bhagavantam abbhācikkhi na hi sādhu bhagavataḥ na hi bhagavā evam vadeyya

original: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṁ upekkhāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;
analyzed: aṭṭhānam ete āvuso anavakāsaḥ yam upekkhāya cetaḥ vimuttiyāḥ bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya su samāraddhāya

original: atha ca panassa rāgo cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: atha ca panassa rāgaḥ cittam pariyādāya na itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Nissaraṇañhetaṁ, āvuso, rāgassa yadidaṁ upekkhācetovimuttī’ti.
analyzed: nissaraṇam ha itas āvuso rāgassa yat idam upekkhā cetaḥ vimutti iti

original: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: idha pana bhikkhave bhikkhu evam vadeyya

original: ‘animittā hi kho me cetovimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yānīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā susamāraddhā;
analyzed: animittā hi kho me cetaḥ vimutti bhāvitā bahulīkatā yā anīkatā vatthukatā anuṭṭhitā paricitā su samāraddhā

original: atha ca pana me nimittānusāri viññāṇaṁ hotī’ti.
analyzed: atha ca pana me nimitta anusāri viññāṇam hoti iti

original: So ‘mā hevan’tissa vacanīyo: ‘māyasmā evaṁ avaca; mā bhagavantaṁ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṁ, na hi bhagavā evaṁ vadeyya.
analyzed: saḥ mā hevantissa vacanīyaḥ mā ayasmai evam avaca mā bhagavantam abbhācikkhi na hi sādhu bhagavataḥ na hi bhagavā evam vadeyya

original: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṁ animittāya cetovimuttiyā bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya;

original: atha ca panassa nimittānusāri viññāṇaṁ bhavissati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: atha ca panassa nimitta anusāri viññāṇam bhavissati na itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Nissaraṇañhetaṁ, āvuso, sabbanimittānaṁ yadidaṁ animittācetovimuttī’ti.
analyzed: nissaraṇam ha itas āvuso sabba nimittānam yat idam animittā cetas vimutti iti

original: Idha pana bhikkhave, bhikkhu evaṁ vadeyya:

original: ‘asmīti kho me vigataṁ, ayamahamasmīti ca na samanupassāmi;

original: atha ca pana me vicikicchākathaṅkathāsallaṁ cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’ti.
analyzed: atha ca pana me vicikicchā kathaṅkathā sallam cittam pariyādāya tiṭṭhati iti

original: So ‘mā hevan’tissa vacanīyo: ‘māyasmā evaṁ avaca; mā bhagavantaṁ abbhācikkhi, na hi sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṁ, na hi bhagavā evaṁ vadeyya.
analyzed: saḥ mā hevantissa vacanīyaḥ mā ayasmai evam avaca mā bhagavantam abbhācikkhi na hi sādhu bhagavataḥ na hi bhagavā evam vadeyya

original: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, āvuso, anavakāso yaṁ asmīti vigate ayamahamasmīti ca na samanupassato;
analyzed: aṭṭhānam ete āvuso anavakāsaḥ yam asmi iti vigate ayam aham asmi iti ca na samanupassato

original: atha ca panassa vicikicchākathaṅkathāsallaṁ cittaṁ pariyādāya ṭhassati, netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: atha ca panassa vicikicchā kathaṅkathā sallam cittam pariyādāya na itam ṭhānam vijjati

original: Nissaraṇañhetaṁ, āvuso, vicikicchākathaṅkathāsallassa yadidaṁ asmīti mānasamugghāto’ti.
analyzed: nissaraṇam ha itas āvuso vicikicchā kathaṅkathā sallassa yat idam asmi iti mānasa mugghāto ti

original: Imā kho, bhikkhave, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo”ti.
analyzed: imāḥ kho bhikkhave cha nissāraṇīyāḥ dhātuyo ti

original: Tatiyaṁ.
analyzed: tatiya

original: Aṅguttara Nikāya 6.14
analyzed: aṅguttara nikāya

original: 2. Sāraṇīyavagga
analyzed: sāraṇīya vagga

original: Bhaddakasutta
analyzed: bhaddaka sutta

original: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “āvuso bhikkhave”ti.
analyzed: āvuso bhikkhave ti

original: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: āvuso ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa

original: Āyasmā sāriputto etadavoca:

original: “Tathā tathā, āvuso, bhikkhu vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti, na bhaddikā kālakiriyā.

original: Kathañcāvuso, bhikkhu tathā tathā vihāraṁ kappeti yathā yathāssa vihāraṁ kappayato na bhaddakaṁ maraṇaṁ hoti, na bhaddikā kālakiriyā?
analyzed: katham ca āvuso bhikkhu tathā tathā vihāram kappeti yathā yathā assa vihāram kappayataḥ na bhaddakam maraṇam hoti na bhaddikā kālakiriyā

original: Idhāvuso, bhikkhu kammārāmo hoti kammarato kammārāmataṁ anuyutto, bhassārāmo hoti

analyzed: evam kho āvuso bhikkhu tathā tathā vihāram kappeti yathā yathā assa vihāram kappayataḥ na bhaddakam maraṇam hoti na bhaddikā kālakiriyā

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena migasālāya upāsikāya nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.

analyzed: atha khalu migasālā upāsikā yena ayasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho migasālā upāsikā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:

original: “Kathaṁ kathaṁ nāmāyaṁ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyaṁ?
analyzed: katham katham nāmāya bhante ānanda bhagavatā dhammaḥ desitaḥ aññeyyaḥ yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho sama sama gatikāḥ bhavissanti abhisamparāya

original: Pitā me, bhante, purāṇo brahmacārī ahosi ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
analyzed: pitā me bhante purāṇaḥ brahmacārī ahosi ārācārī virataḥ methunā gāmadhammā

original: Petteyyopi me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacārī ahosi sadārasantuṭṭho.
analyzed: petteyyaḥ api me bhante isidattaḥ abrahmacārī ahosi sa dāra santuṭṭhaḥ

original: Sopi kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmipatto tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapannoti.
analyzed: saḥ api kālaṅkataḥ bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmi patto tusitam kāyam upapannoti

original: Kathaṁ kathaṁ nāmāyaṁ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyan”ti?
analyzed: katham katham nāmāya bhante ānanda bhagavatā dhammaḥ desitaḥ aññeyyaḥ yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho sama sama gatikāḥ bhavissanti abhisamparāyanti

original: “Evaṁ kho panetaṁ, bhagini, bhagavatā byākatan”ti.
analyzed: evam khalu pana ita bhagini bhagavatā byākatanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando migasālāya upāsikāya nivesane piṇḍapātaṁ gahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā

original: ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena migasālāya upāsikāya nivesanaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁ; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdiṁ.
analyzed: idha aha bhante pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya yena migasālāya upāsikāya nivesanam tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Atha kho, bhante, migasālā upāsikā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho, bhante, migasālā upāsikā maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu bhante migasālā upāsikā yena aham tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā mam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnā khalu bhante migasālā upāsikā mam etat avoca

original: ‘kathaṁ kathaṁ nāmāyaṁ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyaṁ.
analyzed: katham katham nāmāya bhante ānanda bhagavatā dhammaḥ desitaḥ aññeyyaḥ yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho sama sama gatikāḥ bhavissanti abhisamparāya

original: Pitā me, bhante, purāṇo brahmacārī ahosi ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
analyzed: pitā me bhante purāṇaḥ brahmacārī ahosi ārācārī virataḥ methunā gāmadhammā

original: So kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmipatto tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapannoti.
analyzed: saḥ kālaṅkataḥ bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmi patto tusitam kāyam upapannoti

original: Petteyyopi me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacārī ahosi sadārasantuṭṭho.
analyzed: petteyyaḥ api me bhante isidattaḥ abrahmacārī ahosi sa dāra santuṭṭhaḥ

original: Sopi kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmipatto tusitaṁ kāyaṁ upapannoti.
analyzed: saḥ api kālaṅkataḥ bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmi patto tusitam kāyam upapannoti

original: Kathaṁ kathaṁ nāmāyaṁ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyan’ti?
analyzed: katham katham nāmāya bhante ānanda bhagavatā dhammaḥ desitaḥ aññeyyaḥ yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho sama sama gatikāḥ bhavissanti abhisamparāyanti

original: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, migasālaṁ upāsikaṁ etadavocaṁ:

original: ‘evaṁ kho panetaṁ, bhagini, bhagavatā byākatan’”ti.

original: Idhānanda, ekacco puggalo sorato hoti sukhasaṁvāso, abhinandanti sabrahmacārī ekattavāsena.

original: Tassa savanenapi akataṁ hoti, bāhusaccenapi akataṁ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi appaṭividdhaṁ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṁ na labhati.

original: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā hānāya pareti no visesāya, hānagāmīyeva hoti no visesagāmī.
analyzed: so kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā hānāya pareti no visesāya hāna gāmīya iva hoti no visesa gāmī

original: Idha panānanda, ekacco puggalo sorato hoti sukhasaṁvāso, abhinandanti sabrahmacārī ekattavāsena.

analyzed: bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnam kho āyasmantam dhammikam bhagavān etat avoca

original: “handa kuto nu tvaṁ, brāhmaṇa dhammika, āgacchasī”ti?
analyzed: handa kutas nu tva brāhmaṇa dhammikaḥ āgacchasi iti

original: “Pabbājito ahaṁ, bhante, jātibhūmakehi upāsakehi sabbaso jātibhūmiyaṁ sattahi āvāsehī”ti.
analyzed: pabbājitaḥ aha bhante jāti bhūmakehi upāsakehi sabbasas jāti bhūmiyam sattahi āvāsehi iti

original: “Alaṁ, brāhmaṇa dhammika, kiṁ te iminā, yaṁ taṁ tato tato pabbājenti, so tvaṁ tato tato pabbājito mameva santike āgacchasi.
analyzed: ala brāhmaṇa dhammika kim te iminā yam tam tatas tatas pabbājenti saḥ tvam tatas tatas pabbājitaḥ mama eva santike āgacchasi

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, brāhmaṇa dhammika, sāmuddikā vāṇijā tīradassiṁ sakuṇaṁ gahetvā nāvāya samuddaṁ ajjhogāhanti.
analyzed: bhūta pubba brāhmaṇa dhammika sāmuddikāḥ vāṇijāḥ tīra dassim sakuṇam gahetvā nāvāya samuddaṃ ajjhogāhanti

original: Te atīradakkhiṇiyā nāvāya tīradassiṁ sakuṇaṁ muñcanti.
analyzed: te a tīra dakkhiṇiyāḥ nāvāya tīra dassim sakuṇam muñcanti

original: So gacchateva puratthimaṁ disaṁ, gacchati pacchimaṁ disaṁ, gacchati uttaraṁ disaṁ, gacchati dakkhiṇaṁ disaṁ, gacchati uddhaṁ, gacchati anudisaṁ.
analyzed: saḥ gacchatā iva puratthimam disa gacchati pacchimam disa gacchati uttaram disa gacchati dakkhiṇam disa gacchati uddha gacchati anudisa

original: Sace so samantā tīraṁ passati, tathāgatakova hoti.
analyzed: sace so samantā tīram passati tathāgatakaḥ uva hoti

original: Sace pana so samantā tīraṁ na passati tameva nāvaṁ paccāgacchati.
analyzed: sace pana so samantā tīram na passati tam eva nāvam paccāgacchati

original: Evamevaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, yaṁ taṁ tato tato pabbājenti so tvaṁ tato tato pabbājito mameva santike āgacchasi.
analyzed: evam evam kho brāhmaṇa dhammika yam tam tatas tatas pabbājenti saḥ tvam tatas tatas pabbājitaḥ mama eva santike āgacchasi

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, brāhmaṇa dhammika, rañño korabyassa suppatiṭṭho nāma nigrodharājā ahosi pañcasākho sītacchāyo manoramo.
analyzed: bhūta pubba brāhmaṇa dhammika raññaḥ korabyassa suppatiṭṭhaḥ nāma nigrodha rājā ahosi pañca sākhaḥ sīta chāyaḥ manoramaḥ

original: Suppatiṭṭhassa kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, nigrodharājassa dvādasayojanāni abhiniveso ahosi, pañca yojanāni mūlasantānakānaṁ.
analyzed: suppatiṭṭhassa kho pana brāhmaṇa dhammika nigrodha rājassa dvādasa yojanāni abhinivesaḥ ahosi pañca yojanāni mūla santānakāna

original: Suppatiṭṭhassa kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, nigrodharājassa tāva mahantāni phalāni ahesuṁ;
analyzed: suppatiṭṭhassa kho pana brāhmaṇa dhammika nigrodha rājassa tāva mahantāni phalāni ahesu

original: seyyathāpi nāma āḷhakathālikā.
analyzed: sā iyyathā api nāma āḷhakathālikā

original: Evamassa sādūni phalāni ahesuṁ;
analyzed: evam assa sādūni phalāni ahesu

original: seyyathāpi nāma khuddaṁ madhuṁ anelakaṁ.
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma khuddam madhum anelaka

original: Suppatiṭṭhassa kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, nigrodharājassa ekaṁ khandhaṁ rājā paribhuñjati
analyzed: suppatiṭṭhassa kho pana brāhmaṇa dhammika nigrodha rājassa ekam khandham rājā paribhuñjati

original: saddhiṁ itthāgārena, ekaṁ khandhaṁ balakāyo paribhuñjati, ekaṁ khandhaṁ negamajānapadā
analyzed: saddhim itthāgārena ekam khandham balakāyaḥ paribhuñjati ekam khandham negama jānapadā

original: paribhuñjanti, ekaṁ khandhaṁ samaṇabrāhmaṇā paribhuñjanti, ekaṁ khandhaṁ migā paribhuñjanti.
analyzed: paribhuñjanti ekam khandham samaṇa brāhmaṇā paribhuñjanti ekam khandham migā paribhuñjanti

original: Suppatiṭṭhassa kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, nigrodharājassa na koci phalāni rakkhati, na ca sudaṁ aññamaññassa phalāni hiṁsanti.
analyzed: suppatiṭṭhassa kho pana brāhmaṇa dhammika nigrodha rājassa na koci phalāni rakkhati na ca sudam añña maññassa phalāni hisanti

original: Atha kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, aññataro puriso suppatiṭṭhassa nigrodharājassa yāvadatthaṁ phalāni bhakkhitvā sākhaṁ bhañjitvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho brāhmaṇa dhammika aññataraḥ puriso suppatiṭṭhassa nigrodha rājassa yāvadattham phalāni bhakkhitvā sākham bhañjitvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, suppatiṭṭhe nigrodharāje adhivatthāya devatāya etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho brāhmaṇa dhammika suppatiṭṭhe nigrodha rāje adhivatthāya devatāya etat ahosi

original: ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho

original: Yāva pāpo manusso, yatra hi nāma suppatiṭṭhassa nigrodharājassa yāvadatthaṁ phalāni
analyzed: pāpaḥ manussaḥ yatra hi nāma suppatiṭṭhassa nigrodha rājassa yāvadattham phalāni

original: bhakkhitvā sākhaṁ bhañjitvā pakkamissati, yannūna suppatiṭṭho nigrodharājā āyatiṁ
analyzed: bhakkhitvā sākham bhañjitvā pakkamissati yat nūna suppatiṭṭhaḥ nigrodha rājā āyati

original: phalaṁ na dadeyyā’ti.
analyzed: phalam na dadeyāt iti

original: Atha kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, suppatiṭṭho nigrodharājā āyatiṁ phalaṁ na adāsi.
analyzed: atha kho brāhmaṇa dhammika suppatiṭṭhaḥ nigrodha rājā āyatim phalam na adāsi

original: Atha kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, rājā korabyo yena sakko devānamindo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu brāhmaṇa dhammika rājā korabyaḥ yena sakkaḥ devānamindo tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā sakkam devānamindam etat avoca

original: ‘yagghe, mārisa, jāneyyāsi suppatiṭṭho nigrodharājā phalaṁ na detī’ti.
analyzed: yat he mārisa jāneyyāsi suppatiṭṭhaḥ nigrodha rājā phalam na deti iti

original: Atha kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, sakko devānamindo tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsi, yathā bhusā vātavuṭṭhi āgantvā suppatiṭṭhaṁ nigrodharājaṁ pavattesi ummūlamakāsi.
analyzed: atha kho brāhmaṇa dhammika sakkaḥ devānamindo tathārūpam iddha abhisaṅkhāram abhisaṅkhāsi yathā bhusā vāta vuṭṭhi āgantvā suppatiṭṭham nigrodha rājam pavattesi ummūlam akāsi

original: Atha kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, suppatiṭṭhe nigrodharāje adhivatthā devatā dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: atha kho brāhmaṇa dhammika suppatiṭṭhe nigrodha rāje adhivatthā devatā dukkhī dummanāḥ assu mukhī rudamānā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi

original: Atha kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, sakko devānamindo yena suppatiṭṭhe nigrodharāje adhivatthā devatā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā suppatiṭṭhe nigrodharāje adhivatthaṁ devataṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho brāhmaṇa dhammika sakkaḥ devānamindaḥ yena suppatiṭṭhe nigrodha rāje adhivatthā devatā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā suppatiṭṭhe nigrodha rāje adhivattham devatam etat avoca

original: ‘kiṁ nu tvaṁ, devate, dukkhī dummanā assumukhī rudamānā ekamantaṁ ṭhitā’ti?
analyzed: kim nu tva devate dukkhī dummanāḥ assu mukhī rudamānā ekamantam ṭhitā ati

original: ‘Tathā hi pana me, mārisa, bhusā vātavuṭṭhi āgantvā bhavanaṁ pavattesi ummūlamakāsī’ti.
analyzed: tathā hi pana me mārisa bhusā vāta vuṭṭhi āgantvā bhavanam pavattesi ummūlam akāsi iti

original: ‘Api nu tvaṁ, devate, rukkhadhamme ṭhitāya bhusā vātavuṭṭhi āgantvā bhavanaṁ pavattesi ummūlamakāsī’ti?
analyzed: api nu tva devate rukkha dhamme ṭhitāya bhusā vāta vuṭṭhi āgantvā bhavanam pavattesi ummūlam akāsi iti

original: ‘Kathaṁ pana, mārisa, rukkho rukkhadhamme ṭhito hotī’ti?
analyzed: katham pana mārisa rukkhaḥ rukkha dhamme ṭhitaḥ hoti iti

original: ‘Idha, devate, rukkhassa mūlaṁ mūlatthikā haranti, tacaṁ tacatthikā haranti, pattaṁ pattatthikā haranti, pupphaṁ pupphatthikā haranti, phalaṁ phalatthikā haranti.
analyzed: idha devate rukkhassa mūlam mūla tthikāḥ haranti tacam taca tthikāḥ haranti pattam patta tthikāḥ haranti puppham puppha tthikāḥ haranti phalam phala tthikāḥ haranti

original: Na ca tena devatāya anattamanatā vā anabhinandi vā karaṇīyā.
analyzed: na ca tena devatāya anatta manatā vā anabhinandi vā karaṇīyā

original: Evaṁ kho, devate, rukkho rukkhadhamme ṭhito hotī’ti.
analyzed: evam kho devate rukkhaḥ rukkha dhamme ṭhitaḥ hoti iti

original: ‘Aṭṭhitāyeva kho me, mārisa, rukkhadhamme bhusā vātavuṭṭhi āgantvā bhavanaṁ pavattesi ummūlamakāsī’ti.
analyzed: aṭṭhitāya iva kho me mārisa rukkha dhamme bhusā vāta vuṭṭhi āgantvā bhavanam pavattesi ummūlam akāsi iti

original: ‘Sace kho tvaṁ, devate, rukkhadhamme tiṭṭheyyāsi, siyā te bhavanaṁ yathāpure’ti.
analyzed: sace kho tva devate rukkhadhamme tiṭṭheyyāsi siyā te bhavanam yathāpurā iti

original: ‘Ṭhassāmahaṁ, mārisa, rukkhadhamme, hotu me bhavanaṁ yathāpure’ti.
analyzed: ṭhassāmaha mārisa rukkhadhamme hotu me bhavanam yathāpurā iti

original: Atha kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, sakko devānamindo tathārūpaṁ iddhābhisaṅkhāraṁ abhisaṅkhāsi,
analyzed: atha kho brāhmaṇa dhammika sakkaḥ devānamindaḥ tathārūpam iddha abhisaṅkhāram abhisaṅkhāsi

original: yathā bhusā vātavuṭṭhi āgantvā suppatiṭṭhaṁ nigrodharājaṁ ussāpesi, sacchavīni mūlāni ahesuṁ.
analyzed: yathā bhusā vātavuṭṭhi āgantvā suppatiṭṭham nigrodha rājam ussāpesi sa chavīni mūlāni ahesu

original: Evamevaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, api nu taṁ samaṇadhamme ṭhitaṁ jātibhūmakā upāsakā pabbājesuṁ sabbaso jātibhūmiyaṁ sattahi āvāsehī”ti?
analyzed: evam evam kho brāhmaṇa dhammika api nu tam samaṇa dhamme ṭhitam jāti bhūmakāḥ upāsakā pabbājesum sabbasas jāti bhūmiyam sattahi āvāsehi iti

original: “Kathaṁ pana, bhante, samaṇo samaṇadhamme ṭhito hotī”ti?
analyzed: katham pana bhante samaṇaḥ samaṇa dhamme ṭhitaḥ hoti iti

original: “Idha, brāhmaṇa dhammika, samaṇo akkosantaṁ na paccakkosati, rosantaṁ na paṭirosati, bhaṇḍantaṁ na paṭibhaṇḍati.
analyzed: idha brāhmaṇa dhammika samaṇaḥ akkosantam na paccakkosati rosantam na paṭirosati bhaṇḍantam na paṭibhaṇḍati

original: Evaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, samaṇo samaṇadhamme ṭhito hotī”ti.
analyzed: evam kho brāhmaṇa dhammika samaṇaḥ samaṇa dhamme ṭhitaḥ hoti iti

original: “Aṭṭhitaṁyeva maṁ, bhante, samaṇadhamme jātibhūmakā upāsakā pabbājesuṁ sabbaso jātibhūmiyaṁ sattahi āvāsehī”ti.
analyzed: aṭṭhitayā iva ma bhante samaṇa dhamme jāti bhūmakāḥ upāsakā pabbājesum sabbasas jāti bhūmiyam sattahi āvāsehi iti

original: “Bhūtapubbaṁ, brāhmaṇa dhammika, sunetto nāma satthā ahosi titthakaro kāmesu vītarāgo.
analyzed: bhūta pubba brāhmaṇa dhammika sunettaḥ nāma satthā ahosi titthakaraḥ kāmesu vīta rāgaḥ

original: Sunettassa kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, satthuno anekāni sāvakasatāni ahesuṁ.
analyzed: sunettassa kho pana brāhmaṇa dhammika satthunaḥ anekāni sāvaka satāni ahesu

original: Sunetto satthā sāvakānaṁ brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ desesi.
analyzed: sunettaḥ satthā sāvakānam brahma loka sahabya tāya dhammaṃ desesi

original: Ye kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, sunettassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ
analyzed: ye kho pana brāhmaṇa dhammika sunettassa satthuno brahma loka sahabya tāya dhamma

original: desentassa cittāni na pasādesuṁ te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ
analyzed: desentassa cittāni na pasādesum te kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipāta

original: nirayaṁ upapajjiṁsu.
analyzed: nirayam upapajjisu

original: Ye kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, sunettassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ desentassa cittāni pasādesuṁ te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjiṁsu.
analyzed: ye kho pana brāhmaṇa dhammika sunettassa satthuno brahma loka sahabya tāya dhammaṃ desentassa cittāni pasādesum te kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjisu

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, brāhmaṇa dhammika, mūgapakkho nāma satthā ahosi …pe…
analyzed: bhūtapubba brāhmaṇa dhammika mūgapakkhaḥ nāma satthā ahosi pe

original: Aranemi nāma satthā ahosi …
analyzed: aranemi nāma satthā ahosi

original: … Kuddālako nāma satthā ahosi …
analyzed: kuddālakaḥ nāma satthā ahosi

original: … Hatthipālo nāma satthā ahosi …
analyzed: hatthipālaḥ nāma satthā ahosi

original: … Jotipālo nāma satthā ahosi titthakaro kāmesu vītarāgo.
analyzed: jotipālaḥ nāma satthā ahosi titthakaraḥ kāmesu vīta rāgaḥ

original: Jotipālassa kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, satthuno anekāni sāvakasatāni ahesuṁ.
analyzed: jotipālassa kho pana brāhmaṇa dhammika satthunaḥ anekāni sāvaka satāni ahesu

original: Jotipālo satthā sāvakānaṁ brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ desesi.
analyzed: jotipālaḥ satthā sāvakānam brahma loka sahabya tāya dhammaṃ desesi

original: Ye kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, jotipālassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ
analyzed: ye kho pana brāhmaṇa dhammika jotipālassa satthuno brahma loka sahabya tāya dhamma

original: desentassa cittāni na pasādesuṁ te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ
analyzed: desentassa cittāni na pasādesum te kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipāta

original: nirayaṁ upapajjiṁsu.
analyzed: nirayam upapajjisu

original: Ye kho pana, brāhmaṇa dhammika, jotipālassa satthuno brahmalokasahabyatāya dhammaṁ desentassa cittāni pasādesuṁ te kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjiṁsu.
analyzed: ye kho pana brāhmaṇa dhammika jotipālassa satthuno brahma loka sahabya tāya dhammaṃ desentassa cittāni pasādesum te kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjisu

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, brāhmaṇa dhammika,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi brāhmaṇa dhammika

original: yo ime cha satthāre titthakare kāmesu vītarāge, anekasataparivāre sasāvakasaṅghe paduṭṭhacitto akkoseyya paribhāseyya, bahuṁ so apuññaṁ pasaveyyā”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ ime cha satthāre titthakare kāmesu vīta rāge aneka sata parivāre sa sāvaka saṅghe paduṭṭha cittaḥ akkoseyya paribhāseyya bahum saḥ apuññam pasaveyya ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: “Yo kho, brāhmaṇa dhammika, ime cha satthāre titthakare kāmesu vītarāge anekasataparivāre sasāvakasaṅghe paduṭṭhacitto akkoseyya paribhāseyya, bahuṁ so apuññaṁ pasaveyya.
analyzed: yaḥ kho brāhmaṇa dhammike ime cha satthāre titthakare kāmesu vīta rāge aneka sata parivāre sa sāvaka saṅghe paduṭṭha cittaḥ akkoseyya paribhāseyya bahum saḥ apuññam pasaveyya

original: Yo ekaṁ diṭṭhisampannaṁ puggalaṁ paduṭṭhacitto akkosati paribhāsati, ayaṁ tato bahutaraṁ apuññaṁ pasavati.
analyzed: yaḥ ekam diṭṭhi sampannam puggalam paduṭṭha cittaḥ akkosati paribhāsati ayam tatas bahutaram apuññam pasavati

original: Taṁ kissa hetu?
analyzed: tam kim sa hetu

original: Nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa dhammika, ito bahiddhā evarūpiṁ khantiṁ vadāmi, yathāmaṁ sabrahmacārīsu.
analyzed: na āha brāhmaṇa dhammikaḥ itas bahiddhā evarūpim khantim vadāmi yathā āmam sabrahmacārīsu

original: Tasmātiha, brāhmaṇa dhammika, evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ:
analyzed: tasmā ati ha brāhmaṇa dhammikaḥ evam sikkhitabba

original: ‘na no samasabrahmacārīsu cittāni paduṭṭhāni bhavissantī’ti.
analyzed: na naḥ sama sabrahmacārīsu cittāni paduṭṭhāni bhavissanti iti

original: Evañhi te, brāhmaṇa dhammika, sikkhitabbanti.
analyzed: evam hi te brāhmaṇa dhammika sikkhitabbanti

original: Sunetto mūgapakkho ca,
analyzed: su nettaḥ mūga pakkhaḥ ca

original: aranemi ca brāhmaṇo;
analyzed: aranemi ca brāhmaṇaḥ

original: Kuddālako ahu satthā,
analyzed: kuddālakaḥ ahu satthā

original: hatthipālo ca māṇavo.
analyzed: hatthi pālo ca māṇavo

original: Jotipālo ca govindo,
analyzed: joti pālo ca govindo

original: ahu sattapurohito;
analyzed: ahu satta purohito

original: Ahiṁsakā atītaṁse,
analyzed: ahisakāḥ atītase

original: cha satthāro yasassino.
analyzed: cha satthāraḥ yasassinaḥ

original: Nirāmagandhā karuṇedhimuttā,
Kāmasaṁyojanātigā;
analyzed: kāma sayojana atigā

original: Kāmarāgaṁ virājetvā,
analyzed: kāma rāgam virājetvā

original: Brahmalokūpagā ahuṁ.
analyzed: brahma loka upagāḥ ahu

original: Ahesuṁ sāvakā tesaṁ,
analyzed: ahesum sāvakāḥ

original: Anekāni satānipi;
analyzed: anekāni satānipi

original: Nirāmagandhā karuṇedhimuttā,
Kāmasaṁyojanātigā;
analyzed: kāma sayojana atigā

original: Kāmarāgaṁ virājetvā,
analyzed: kāma rāgam virājetvā

original: Brahmalokūpagā ahuṁ.
analyzed: brahma loka upagāḥ ahu

original: Yete isī bāhirake,
analyzed: ye te isī bāhirake

original: vītarāge samāhite;
analyzed: vīta rāge samāhite

original: Paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo,
analyzed: paduṭṭha mana saṅkappaḥ

original: yo naro paribhāsati;
analyzed: yaḥ naraḥ paribhāsati

original: Bahuñca so pasavati,

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, soṇa, yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo accāyatā honti, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vā”ti?
analyzed: tam kim maññasi soṇa yadā te vīṇāya tantiyaḥ accāyatāḥ honti api nu te vīṇā tasmin samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vāti

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, soṇa, yadā te vīṇāya tantiyo atisithilā honti, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vā”ti?

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Yadā pana te, soṇa, vīṇāya tantiyo na accāyatā honti nātisithilā same guṇe patiṭṭhitā, api nu te vīṇā tasmiṁ samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vā”ti?
analyzed: yadā pana te soṇa vīṇāya tantiyaḥ na accāyatāḥ honti na ati sithilā same guṇe patiṭṭhitā api nu te vīṇā tasmin samaye saravatī vā hoti kammaññā vā ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: jivhāviññeyyā rasā …

analyzed: amissīkatam eva assa cittam hoti ṭhitam āneñja ppattam vayaṃ cassa anupassati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, selo pabbato acchiddo asusiro ekagghano.

original: “Kacci te, phagguna, khamanīyaṁ kacci yāpanīyaṁ? Kacci te dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti; paṭikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no abhikkamo”ti?

original: “Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me bhante khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya; evamevaṁ kho me, bhante, adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.

original: Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me bhante khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, balavā puriso daḷhena varattakkhaṇḍena sīsaveṭhanaṁ dadeyya; evamevaṁ kho me, bhante, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā.

original: Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me bhante khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṁ parikanteyya; evamevaṁ kho me, bhante, adhimattā vātā kucchiṁ parikantanti.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante dakkhaḥ go ghātakaḥ vā go ghāta kantevāsī vā tiṇhena go vikantanena kucchim parikanteyya evam evam kho me bhante adhimattāḥ vātāḥ kucchim parikantanti

original: Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo.
analyzed: na me bhante khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkamaḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṁ purisaṁ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṁ samparitāpeyyuṁ; evamevaṁ kho me, bhante, adhimatto kāyasmiṁ ḍāho.

original: Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṁ na yāpanīyaṁ. Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti; abhikkamosānaṁ paññāyati, no paṭikkamo”ti.
analyzed: na me bhante khamanīyam na yāpanīya bāḷhā me dukkhāḥ vedanāḥ abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti abhikkama usānam paññāyati no paṭikkama uti

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ phaggunaṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṁsetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: Chaḷabhijātisutta
analyzed: chaṭ abhijāti sutta

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “pūraṇena, bhante, kassapena chaḷabhijātiyo paññattā—
analyzed: pūraṇena bhante kassapena chaḍ abhijātiyaḥ paññattā

original: kaṇhābhijāti paññattā, nīlābhijāti paññattā, lohitābhijāti paññattā, haliddābhijāti paññattā, sukkābhijāti paññattā, paramasukkābhijāti paññattā.
analyzed: kaṇhā abhijāti paññattā nīlā abhijāti paññattā lohitābhijāti paññattā haliddā abhijāti paññattā sukkā abhijāti paññattā paramasukkā abhijāti paññattā

original: Tatridaṁ, bhante, pūraṇena kassapena kaṇhābhijāti paññattā, orabbhikā sūkarikā sākuṇikā
analyzed: tatrida bhante pūraṇena kassapena kaṇhā abhijāti paññattā orabbhikā sūkarikā sākuṇikā

original: māgavikā luddā macchaghātakā corā coraghātakā bandhanāgārikā ye vā panaññepi keci kurūrakammantā.
analyzed: māgavikāḥ luddāḥ maccha ghātakā corā cora ghātakā bandhanāgārikāḥ ye vā pana aññe pi keci kurūra kammantā

original: Tatridaṁ, bhante, pūraṇena kassapena nīlābhijāti paññattā, bhikkhū kaṇṭakavuttikā ye vā panaññepi keci kammavādā kriyavādā.
analyzed: tatrida bhante pūraṇena kassapena nīlābhijāti paññattā bhikkhū kaṇṭakavuttikā ye vā pana aññe pi keci kamma vādā kriya vādā

original: Tatridaṁ, bhante, pūraṇena kassapena lohitābhijāti paññattā, nigaṇṭhā ekasāṭakā.
analyzed: tatrida bhante pūraṇena kassapena lohitābhijāti paññattā nigaṇṭhā eka sāṭakā

original: Tatridaṁ, bhante, pūraṇena kassapena haliddābhijāti paññattā, gihī odātavasanā acelakasāvakā.
analyzed: tatrida bhante pūraṇena kassapena haliddā abhijāti paññattā gihī odāta vasanā acelaka sāvakā

original: Tatridaṁ, bhante, pūraṇena kassapena sukkābhijāti paññattā, ājīvakā ājīvakiniyo.
analyzed: tatrida bhante pūraṇena kassapena sukka abhijāti paññattāḥ ājīvakāḥ ājīvakiniyo

original: Tatridaṁ, bhante, pūraṇena kassapena paramasukkābhijāti paññattā, nando vaccho kiso saṅkicco makkhali gosālo.
analyzed: tatrida bhante pūraṇena kassapena paramasukkābhijāti paññattā nandaḥ vacchaḥ kisaḥ saṅkiccaḥ makkhali gosālo

original: Pūraṇena, bhante, kassapena imā chaḷabhijātiyo paññattā”ti.
analyzed: pūraṇena bhante kassapena imāḥ chaḍ abhijātiyaḥ paññattā ati

original: “Kiṁ panānanda, pūraṇassa kassapassa sabbo loko etadabbhanujānāti imā chaḷabhijātiyo paññāpetun”ti?
analyzed: kim pana ānanda pūraṇassa kassapassa sabbaḥ lokaḥ etat abbhanujānāti imāḥ chaḍ abhijātiyaḥ paññāpetunti

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, puriso daliddo assako anāḷhiko, tassa akāmakassa bilaṁ olaggeyyuṁ: ‘idaṁ te, ambho purisa, maṁsañca khāditabbaṁ, mūlañca anuppadātabban’ti.
analyzed: seyyathā api ānanda purisaḥ daliddaḥ assakaḥ a nāḷhikaḥ tassa akāmakassa bilam olaggeyyu idam te ambho purisa masañca khāditabba mūlañca anuppadātabbanti

original: Evamevaṁ kho, ānanda, pūraṇena kassapena appaṭiññāya etesaṁ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ imā chaḷabhijātiyo paññattā, yathā taṁ bālena abyattena akhettaññunā akusalena.
analyzed: evam evam kho ānanda pūraṇena kassapena appaṭiññāya etesam samaṇa brāhmaṇānam imāḥ chaḍ abhijātiyaḥ paññattāḥ yathā tam bālena abyattena a khettaññunā akusalena

original: Ahaṁ kho panānanda, chaḷabhijātiyo paññāpemi.
analyzed: aham kho pana ānanda chaḍ abhijātiyaḥ paññāpemi

original: Taṁ suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “katamā cānanda, chaḷabhijātiyo?
analyzed: katamāḥ ca ānanda chaḍ abhijātiyaḥ

original: Idhānanda, ekacco kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno kaṇhaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
analyzed: idha ānanda ekaccaḥ kaṇha abhijātiyaḥ samāno kaṇham dhammam abhijāyati

original: Idha panānanda, ekacco kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno sukkaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
analyzed: idha pana ānanda ekaccaḥ kaṇha abhijātiyaḥ samāno sukkam dhammam abhijāyati

original: Idha panānanda, ekacco kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ nibbānaṁ abhijāyati.
analyzed: idha pana ānanda ekaccaḥ kaṇha abhijātiyaḥ samānaḥ a kaṇham a sukkam nibbānam abhijāyati

original: Idha panānanda, ekacco sukkābhijātiyo samāno kaṇhaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
analyzed: idha pana ānanda ekaccaḥ sukka abhijātiyaḥ samāno kaṇham dhammam abhijāyati

original: Idha panānanda, ekacco sukkābhijātiyo samāno sukkaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
analyzed: idha pana ānanda ekaccaḥ sukka abhijātiyaḥ samānaḥ sukkam dhammam abhijāyati

original: Idha panānanda, ekacco sukkābhijātiyo samāno akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ nibbānaṁ abhijāyati.
analyzed: idha pana ānanda ekaccaḥ sukka abhijātiyaḥ samānaḥ a kaṇham a sukkam nibbānam abhijāyati

original: Kathañcānanda, kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno kaṇhaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati?
analyzed: kathañca ānanda kaṇha abhijātiyaḥ samānaḥ kaṇham dhammam abhijāyati

original: Idhānanda, ekacco nīce kule paccājāto hoti—caṇḍālakule vā nesādakule vā venakule
analyzed: idha ānandaḥ ekaccaḥ nīce kule paccājātaḥ hoti caṇḍāla kule vā nesāda kule vā vena kule

original: vā rathakārakule vā pukkusakule vā, dalidde appannapānabhojane kasiravuttike, yattha
analyzed: vā rathakāra kule vā pukkusa kule vā dalidde appanna pāna bhojane kasira vuttike yattha

original: kasirena ghāsacchādo labbhati.
analyzed: kasirena ghāsa chādaḥ labbhati

original: So ca hoti dubbaṇṇo duddasiko okoṭimako bavhābādho kāṇo vā kuṇī vā khañjo vā pakkhahato
analyzed: so ca hoti dubbaṇṇaḥ duddasikaḥ okoṭimakaḥ bavhābādhaḥ kāṇaḥ vā kuṇī vā khañjaḥ vā pakkha hato

original: vā, na lābhī annassa pānassa vatthassa yānassa mālāgandhavilepanassa seyyāvasathapadīpeyyassa.
analyzed: vā na lābhī annassa pānassa vatthassa yānassa mālā gandha vilepanassa seyyā āvasatha padīpeyyassa

original: So kāyena duccaritaṁ carati, vācāya duccaritaṁ carati, manasā duccaritaṁ carati.
analyzed: saḥ kāyena duccaritam carati vācāya duccaritam carati manasā duccaritam carati

original: So kāyena duccaritaṁ caritvā, vācāya duccaritaṁ caritvā, manasā duccaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: saḥ kāyena duccaritam caritvā vācāya duccaritam caritvā manasā duccaritam caritvā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati

original: Evaṁ kho, ānanda, kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno kaṇhaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
analyzed: evam kho ānanda kaṇha abhijātiyaḥ samānaḥ kaṇham dhammam abhijāyati

original: Kathañcānanda, kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno sukkaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati?
analyzed: kathañca ānanda kaṇha abhijātiyaḥ samānaḥ sukkam dhammam abhijāyati

original: Idhānanda, ekacco nīce kule paccājāto hoti—caṇḍālakule vā …pe…
analyzed: idha ānanda ekaccaḥ nīce kule paccājātaḥ hoti caṇḍāla kule vā pe

original: seyyāvasathapadīpeyyassa.
analyzed: seyya āvasatha padī peyyassa

original: So kāyena sucaritaṁ carati, vācāya sucaritaṁ carati, manasā sucaritaṁ carati.
analyzed: saḥ kāyena su caritam carati vācāya su caritam carati manasā su caritam carati

original: So kāyena sucaritaṁ caritvā, vācāya sucaritaṁ caritvā, manasā sucaritaṁ caritvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: saḥ kāyena su caritam caritvā vācāya su caritam caritvā manasā su caritam caritvā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati

original: Evaṁ kho, ānanda, kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno sukkaṁ dhammaṁ abhijāyati.
analyzed: evam kho ānanda kaṇha abhijātiyaḥ samānaḥ sukkam dhammam abhijāyati

original: Kathañcānanda, kaṇhābhijātiyo samāno akaṇhaṁ asukkaṁ nibbānaṁ abhijāyati?
analyzed: katham ca ānanda kaṇha abhijātiyaḥ samānaḥ a kaṇham a sukkam nibbānam abhijāyati

original: Idhānanda, ekacco nīce kule paccājāto hoti—caṇḍālakule vā …pe…
analyzed: idha ānanda ekaccaḥ nīce kule paccājātaḥ hoti caṇḍāla kule vā pe

original: so ca hoti dubbaṇṇo duddasiko okoṭimako.
analyzed: saḥ ca hoti dubbaṇṇaḥ duddasikaḥ okoṭimakaḥ

original: So kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati.
analyzed: saḥ kesa massum ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajati

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe,
analyzed: so evam pabbajitaḥ samāno pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetasaḥ upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe

original: catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto, satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṁ bhāvetvā akaṇhaṁ
analyzed: catūsu sati paṭṭhānesu su patiṭṭhita cittaḥ satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtam bhāvetvā

analyzed: asukkam nibbānam abhijāyati

analyzed: evam kho ānanda kaṇha abhijātiyaḥ samānaḥ a kaṇham a sukkam nibbānam abhijāyati

analyzed: kathañca ānanda sukka abhijātiyaḥ samāno kaṇham dhammam abhijāyati

analyzed: idha ānanda ekaccaḥ ucce kule paccājātaḥ hoti khattiya mahāsāla kule vā brāhmaṇa mahāsāla kule

original: Aṅguttara Nikāya 6.58

original: 6. Mahāvagga

original: Āsavasutta
analyzed: āsava sutta

original: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
analyzed: chahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu āhuneyyaḥ hoti pāhuneyyaḥ dakkhiṇeyyaḥ añjali karaṇīyaḥ anuttaram puññakkhettam lokassa

original: Katamehi chahi?
analyzed: katamehi chahi

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ye āsavā saṁvarā pahātabbā te saṁvarena pahīnā honti,
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhuno ye āsavā savarā pahātabbā te savarena pahīnāḥ honti

original: ye āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā te paṭisevanāya pahīnā honti,
analyzed: ye āsavā paṭisevanā pahātabbā te paṭisevanāya pahīnāḥ honti

original: ye āsavā adhivāsanā pahātabbā te adhivāsanāya pahīnā honti,
analyzed: ye āsavāḥ adhivāsanā pahātabbā te adhivāsanāya pahīnāḥ honti

original: ye āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā te parivajjanāya pahīnā honti,
analyzed: ye āsavā parivajjanā pahātabbā te parivajjanāya pahīnāḥ honti

original: ye āsavā vinodanā pahātabbā te vinodanāya pahīnā honti,
analyzed: ye āsavāḥ vinodanā pahātabbā te vinodanāya pahīnāḥ honti

original: ye āsavā bhāvanā pahātabbā te bhāvanāya pahīnā honti.
analyzed: ye āsavāḥ bhāvanā pahātabbā te bhāvanāya pahīnāḥ honti

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, āsavā saṁvarā pahātabbā ye saṁvarena pahīnā honti?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave āsavā savarā pahātabbā ye savarena pahīnāḥ honti

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cakkhundriyasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu paṭisaṅkhā yonisas cakkhu indriya savara savutaḥ viharati

original: Yaṁ hissa, bhikkhave, cakkhundriyasaṁvaraṁ asaṁvutassa viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā bārāṇasiyaṁ viharati isipatane migadāye.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā bārāṇasiyam viharati isipatane migadāye

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā therā bhikkhū pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā maṇḍalamāḷe sannisinnā sannipatitā abhidhammakathaṁ kathenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ therāḥ bhikkhū pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantāḥ maṇḍalamāḷe sannisinnā sannipatitāḥ abhidhamma katham kathenti

original: Tatra sudaṁ āyasmā citto hatthisāriputto therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhidhammakathaṁ kathentānaṁ antarantarā kathaṁ opāteti.
analyzed: tatra sudam āyasmā cittaḥ hatthi sāri putto therānam bhikkhūnam abhidhamma katham kathentānam antarantarā katham

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṁ cittaṁ hatthisāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahākoṭṭhikaḥ āyasmantam cittam hatthisāriputtam etat avoca

original: “māyasmā citto hatthisāriputto therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhidhammakathaṁ kathentānaṁ antarantarā kathaṁ opātesi, yāva kathāpariyosānaṁ āyasmā citto āgametū”ti.
analyzed: mā āyasmā cittaḥ hatthisāriputto therānam bhikkhūnam abhidhamma katham kathentānam antarantarā katham opātesi yāva kathā pariyosānam āyasmā cittaḥ āgametu uti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmato cittassa hatthisāriputtassa sahāyakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmataḥ cittassa hatthisāriputtassa sahāyakāḥ bhikkhū āyasmantam mahākoṭṭhikam etat avocuḥ

original: “māyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko āyasmantaṁ cittaṁ hatthisāriputtaṁ apasādesi, paṇḍito āyasmā citto hatthisāriputto.
analyzed: mā āyasmā mahākoṭṭhikaḥ āyasmantam cittam hatthi sāriputtam apasādesi paṇḍitaḥ āyasmā cittaḥ hatthi sāriputto

original: Pahoti cāyasmā citto hatthisāriputto therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ abhidhammakathaṁ kathetun”ti.
analyzed: pahoti ca āyasmā cittaḥ hatthisāri putto therānam bhikkhūnam abhidhamma katham kathetun ti

original: “Dujjānaṁ kho etaṁ, āvuso, parassa cetopariyāyaṁ ajānantehi.
analyzed: dujjānam kho ete āvuso parassa cetaḥ upariyāyam a jānantehi

original: Idhāvuso, ekacco puggalo tāvadeva soratasorato hoti, nivātanivāto hoti, upasantupasanto hoti, yāva satthāraṁ upanissāya viharati aññataraṁ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ.
analyzed: idha āvuso ekaccaḥ puggalo tāvat eva sorata sorataḥ hoti nivāta nivātaḥ hoti upasantupasantaḥ hoti yāva satthāram upanissāya viharati aññataram vā garuṭṭhāniyam sabrahmacāri

original: Yato ca kho so vapakassateva satthārā, vapakassati garuṭṭhāniyehi sabrahmacārīhi,
analyzed: yatas ca kho saḥ vapakassatā iva satthārā vapakassati garuṭṭhāniyehi sabrahmacārīhi

original: so saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi raññā rājamahāmattehi
analyzed: so sa saṭṭhaḥ viharati bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi raññā rāja mahāmattehi

original: titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi.
analyzed: titthiyehi titthiya sāvakehi

original: Tassa saṁsaṭṭhassa vissatthassa pākatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
analyzed: tassa sa saṭṭhassa vissatthassa pākatassa bhassa manuyuttassa viharataḥ rāgaḥ cittam anuddhaseti

original: So rāgānuddhaṁsitena cittena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
analyzed: so rāga an uddhasitena cittena sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattati

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, goṇo kiṭṭhādo dāmena vā baddho vaje vā oruddho.
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso goṇaḥ kiṭṭhādaḥ dāmena vā baddhaḥ vaje vā oruddhaḥ

original: Yo nu kho, āvuso, evaṁ vadeyya: ‘na dānāyaṁ goṇo kiṭṭhādo punadeva kiṭṭhaṁ otarissatī’ti, sammā nu kho so, āvuso, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?
analyzed: yaḥ nu kho āvuso evam vadeyya na dāna ayam goṇaḥ kiṭṭhādo punar eva kiṭṭham otarissati iti sammā nu kho saḥ āvuso vadamānaḥ vadeyya ati

original: “No hidaṁ, āvuso”.
analyzed: na u hide āvuso

original: “Ṭhānañhetaṁ, āvuso, vijjati, yaṁ so goṇo kiṭṭhādo dāmaṁ vā chetvā vajaṁ vā bhinditvā, atha punadeva kiṭṭhaṁ otareyyāti.
analyzed: ṭhānan ha itas āvuso vijjati yam saḥ goṇaḥ kiṭṭhādaḥ dāmam vā chetvā vajam vā bhinditvā atha punar eva kiṭṭham otareyya ati

original: Evamevaṁ kho, āvuso, idhekacco puggalo tāvadeva soratasorato hoti, nivātanivāto hoti,
analyzed: evam evam kho āvuso idha ekaccaḥ puggalo tāvat eva sorata sorataḥ hoti nivāta nivātaḥ hoti

original: upasantupasanto hoti yāva satthāraṁ upanissāya viharati aññataraṁ vā garuṭṭhāniyaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ.
analyzed: upasantu upasantaḥ hoti yāva satthāram upanissāya viharati aññataram vā garuṭṭhāniyam sabrahmacāri

original: Yato ca kho so vapakassateva satthārā, vapakassati garuṭṭhāniyehi sabrahmacārīhi,
analyzed: yatas ca kho saḥ vapakassatā iva satthārā vapakassati garuṭṭhāniyehi sabrahmacārīhi

original: so saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi raññā rājamahāmattehi
analyzed: so sa saṭṭhaḥ viharati bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi raññā rāja mahāmattehi

original: titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi.
analyzed: titthiyehi titthiya sāvakehi

analyzed: so rāga an uddhasitena cittena sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattati

original: Idha panāvuso, ekacco puggalo vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: idha pana āvuso ekaccaḥ puggalaḥ vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So ‘lābhimhi paṭhamassa jhānassā’ti saṁsaṭṭho viharati bhikkhūhi …pe…
analyzed: so lābhimhi paṭhamassa jhānassa ati sasaṭṭhaḥ viharati bhikkhūhi pe

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, cātumahāpathe thullaphusitako devo vassanto rajaṁ antaradhāpeyya, cikkhallaṁ pātukareyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso cātumahāpathe thullaphusitakaḥ devaḥ vassantaḥ rajam antaradhāpeyya cikkhallam pātukareyya

original: Yo nu kho, āvuso, evaṁ vadeyya: ‘na dāni amusmiṁ cātumahāpathe punadeva rajo pātubhavissatī’ti, sammā nu kho so, āvuso, vadamāno vadeyyā”ti?

original: “No hidaṁ, āvuso”.

original: “Ṭhānañhetaṁ, āvuso, vijjati, yaṁ amusmiṁ cātumahāpathe manussā vā atikkameyyuṁ, gopasū vā atikkameyyuṁ, vātātapo vā snehagataṁ pariyādiyeyya, atha punadeva rajo pātubhaveyyāti.

analyzed: sā tasmin udakarahade ūmim janeyya yā pacchimāya disāya āgaccheyya pe yā uttarāya

analyzed: saḥ lābhimhi animittassa cetosamādhissa ati sasaṭṭhaḥ viharati bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīhi upāsakehi upāsikāhi raññā rāja mahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiya sāvakehi

original: Tassa saṁsaṭṭhassa vissatthassa pākatassa bhassamanuyuttassa viharato rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti.
analyzed: tassa sa saṭṭhassa vissatthassa pākatassa bhassa manuyuttassa viharataḥ rāgaḥ cittam anuddhaseti

original: So rāgānuddhaṁsitena cittena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattatī”ti.
analyzed: so rāga an uddhasitena cittena sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattati iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā citto hatthisāriputto aparena samayena sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā cittaḥ hatthi sāriputtaḥ aparena samayena sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya āvattati

original: Atha kho cittassa hatthisāriputtassa sahāyakā bhikkhū yenāyasmā mahākoṭṭhiko tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākoṭṭhikaṁ etadavocuṁ:
analyzed: atha kho cittassa hatthisāriputtassa sahāyakāḥ bhikkhū yena āyasmā mahākoṭṭhikaḥ tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahākoṭṭhikam etat avocu

original: ‘imāsañca imāsañca vihārasamāpattīnaṁ citto hatthisāriputto lābhī, atha ca pana sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissatī’ti;
analyzed: imāsam ca imāsam ca vihāra samāpattīnam cittaḥ hatthisāriputto lābhī atha ca pana sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattissati iti

analyzed: ud āhu devatāḥ etam attham

original: ‘citto, bhante, hatthisāriputto imāsañca imāsañca vihārasamāpattīnaṁ lābhī, atha ca pana sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissatī’”ti?
analyzed: cittaḥ bhante hatthisāriputto imāsam ca imāsam ca vihāra samāpattīnam lābhī atha ca pana sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattissati iti

original: ‘citto, bhante, hatthisāriputto imāsañca imāsañca vihārasamāpattīnaṁ lābhī, atha ca pana sikkhaṁ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattissatī’”ti.
analyzed: cittaḥ bhante hatthisāriputto imāsam ca imāsam ca vihāra samāpattīnam lābhī atha ca pana sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya avattissati iti

original: Atha kho cittassa hatthisāriputtassa sahāyakā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;

analyzed: cittaḥ bhante hatthisāriputto imāsam ca imāsam ca vihāra samāpattīnam lābhī atha ca pana sikkham paccakkhāya hīnāya āvattati iti

original: ‘āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho’ti, udāhu kenacideva pariyāyenāti?
analyzed: āpāyikaḥ devadattaḥ nerayikaḥ kappaṭṭhaḥ atekiccho ti udāhu kenacid eva pariyāyena ati

original: Evaṁ kho panetaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā byākatan”ti.
analyzed: evam khalu pana itas āvusaḥ bhagavatā byākatanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “idhāhaṁ, bhante, sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ yena aciravatī nadī tenupasaṅkamiṁ gattāni parisiñcituṁ.
analyzed: idha āha bhante sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhim yena aciravatī nadī tena upasaṅkamim gattāni parisiñcitu

original: Aciravatiyā nadiyā gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsiṁ gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
analyzed: aciravatiyāḥ nadiyāḥ gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā eka cīvaraḥ aṭṭhāsim gattāni pubbāpayamāno

original: Atha kho, bhante, aññataro bhikkhu yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho bhante aññataraḥ bhikkhu yena aham tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā mama etat avoca

original: ‘kiṁ nu kho, āvuso ānanda, sabbaṁ cetaso samannāharitvā nu kho devadatto bhagavatā byākato—
analyzed: kim nu kho āvuso ānanda sabbam cetasaḥ samannāharitvā nu kho devadattaḥ bhagavatā byākataḥ

original: āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekicchoti, udāhu kenacideva pariyāyenā’ti?
analyzed: āpāyikaḥ devadattaḥ nerayikaḥ kappaṭṭhaḥ atekiccho ti udāhu kenacid eva pariyāyena ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, taṁ bhikkhuṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte aha bhante tam bhikkhum etat avoca

original: ‘evaṁ kho panetaṁ, āvuso, bhagavatā byākatan’”ti.
analyzed: evam khalu pana itas āvusaḥ bhagavatā byākatanti

original: “So vā kho, ānanda, bhikkhu navo bhavissati acirapabbajito, thero vā pana bālo abyatto.
analyzed: so vā kho ānanda bhikkhu navaḥ bhavissati acira pabbajitaḥ theraḥ vā pana bālaḥ abyatto

original: Kathañhi nāma yaṁ mayā ekaṁsena byākataṁ tattha dvejjhaṁ āpajjissati.
analyzed: katham hi nāma yam mayā ekasena byākatam tattha dvejjham āpajjissati

original: Nāhaṁ, ānanda, aññaṁ ekapuggalampi samanupassāmi, yo evaṁ mayā sabbaṁ cetaso samannāharitvā byākato, yathayidaṁ devadatto.
analyzed: na aha ānanda aññam eka puggalam pi samanupassāmi yaḥ evam mayā sabbam cetasaḥ samannāharitvā byākataḥ devadatto

original: Yāvakīvañcāhaṁ, ānanda, devadattassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi sukkadhammaṁ addasaṁ;
analyzed: ānanda devadattassa sukka dhammam addasa

original: neva tāvāhaṁ devadattaṁ byākāsiṁ:
analyzed: na iva tāva aham devadattam

original: ‘āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho’ti.
analyzed: āpāyikaḥ devadattaḥ nerayikaḥ kappaṭṭhaḥ atekiccho ti

original: Yato ca kho ahaṁ, ānanda, devadattassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi sukkadhammaṁ na addasaṁ;
analyzed: yatas ca kho aha ānanda devadattassa vā ālagga koṭi nittudana mattam pi sukka dhammam na addasa

original: athāhaṁ devadattaṁ byākāsiṁ:
analyzed: atha aham devadattam

original: ‘āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho’ti.
analyzed: āpāyikaḥ devadattaḥ nerayikaḥ kappaṭṭhaḥ atekiccho ti

original: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, gūthakūpo sādhikaporiso pūro gūthassa samatittiko.
analyzed: seyyathā api ānanda gūtha kūpaḥ sādhika porisaḥ pūraḥ gūthassa sama tittikaḥ

original: Tatra puriso sasīsako nimuggo assa.
analyzed: tatra purisaḥ sa sīsakaḥ nimuggo assa

original: Tassa kocideva puriso uppajjeyya atthakāmo hitakāmo yogakkhemakāmo tamhā gūthakūpā uddharitukāmo.
analyzed: tassa kocid eva purisaḥ uppajjeyya attha kāmaḥ hita kāmaḥ yogakkhema kāmaḥ tamhā gūthakūpā uddharitu kāmo

original: So taṁ gūthakūpaṁ samantānuparigacchanto neva passeyya tassa purisassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi gūthena amakkhitaṁ, yattha taṁ gahetvā uddhareyya.
analyzed: saḥ tam gūthakūpam samantā anuparigacchantaḥ na iva passeyya tassa purisassa vā ālagga koṭi nittudana mattam pi gūthena amakkhita yattha tam gahetvā uddhareyya

original: Evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, ānanda, yato devadattassa vālaggakoṭinittudanamattampi sukkadhammaṁ na addasaṁ;
analyzed: evam evam kho aha ānanda yatas devadattassa vā ālagga koṭi nittudana mattam pi sukka dhammam na addasa

original: athāhaṁ devadattaṁ byākāsiṁ:
analyzed: atha aham devadattam

original: ‘āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho’ti.
analyzed: āpāyikaḥ devadattaḥ nerayikaḥ kappaṭṭhaḥ atekiccho ti

original: Sace tumhe, ānanda, suṇeyyātha tathāgatassa purisindriyañāṇāni vibhajissāmī”ti?
analyzed: sace tumhe ānanda suṇeyyātha tathāgatassa purisa indriya ñāṇāni vibhajissāmi iti

original: “Etassa, bhagavā, kālo; etassa, sugata, kālo
analyzed: etassa bhagavā kālaḥ etassa sugata kālaḥ

original: yaṁ bhagavā purisindriyañāṇāni vibhajeyya. Bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
analyzed: yam bhagavā purisa indriya ñāṇāni vibhajeyya bhagavataḥ sutvā bhikkhū dhāressanti iti

original: “Tenahānanda, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena ha ānanda suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Idhāhaṁ, ānanda, ekaccaṁ puggalaṁ evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
analyzed: idha āha ānanda ekaccam puggalam evam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi

original: ‘imassa kho puggalassa vijjamānā kusalāpi dhammā akusalāpi dhammā’ti.
analyzed: imassa kho puggalassa vijjamānā kusalā api dhammā akusalā api dhammā ati

original: Tamenaṁ aparena samayena evaṁ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi:
analyzed: tam enam aparena samayena evam cetasā cetaḥ paricca pajānāmi

original: ‘imassa kho puggalassa kusalā dhammā antarahitā, akusalā dhammā sammukhībhūtā.
analyzed: imassa kho puggalassa kusalāḥ dhammāḥ antarahitāḥ akusalāḥ dhammā sammukhībhūtā

original: Atthi ca khvassa kusalamūlaṁ asamucchinnaṁ, tamhā tassa kusalā kusalaṁ pātubhavissati.
analyzed: atthi ca khvassa kusala mūlam tamhā tassa kusalā kusalam pātubhavissati

original: Evamayaṁ puggalo āyatiṁ aparihānadhammo bhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: evam ayam puggalaḥ āyatim a parihāna dhammaḥ bhavissati iti

original: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, bījāni akhaṇḍāni apūtīni avātātapahatāni sāradāni sukhasayitāni sukhette suparikammakatāya bhūmiyā nikkhittāni.
analyzed: seyyathā api ānanda bījāni akhaṇḍāni a pūtīni a vāta ātapa hatāni sāradāni sukha sayitāni su khette su parikammakatāya bhūmiyā nikkhittāni

original: Jāneyyāsi tvaṁ, ānanda, imāni bījāni vuddhiṁ virūḷhiṁ vepullaṁ āpajjissantī”ti?
analyzed: jāneyyāsi tvaḥ ānanda imāni bījāni vuddhim virūḷhim vepullam āpajjissanti iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante
